forum.name: dragon's board
forum.description: words and things from a delinquent "adventurer" from the kingdom of paetyl

thread.title: [central paetyl] check-in

comments.text: it's nice that you chose to drop by the more open section of paetyl! you can drop a comment here to check in. if you found this thread otherwise... [central paetyl]
you can take this adventurer's backpack. hopefully you can get some good use out of it.
